name: Investi-Gator
description:
|
|
v
This is an older version of the game!  The newest version is included with the free sequel, Investi-Gator 2!

^
|
|

Investi-Gator is here to solve the crimes! He's not really clear on what the crime is, but he's sure gonna solve it.

Help this overly trusting reptile figure out the Big Mystery in this short adventure game!

Made by John Guerra, Connor Clang, and Saafris in just under two weeks.
